name: Kidd
descriptions: Kidd is a ghoul encountered in the Old Olney underground in Fallout 3.

One of Sanders' ghouls who tried to establish a new Underworld, literally beneath Old Olney, Kidd and his partner, Wint, are the only survivors after a knocked-down wall unleashed a nest of deathclaws on the nascent community.
Kidd appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
Wint and Kidd are named after the eponymous assassin pair from Ian Fleming's Diamonds Are Forever novel and its film adaptation. In the latter, the two assassins are portrayed as a gay couple.
affiliation: Other ghouls living inOld Olney undergroundWint

topics.response_text: Hey, talk to Wint, okay? I'm just following his lead.
